name: Pilgrim's Pride Corporation
description: Pilgrim's Pride Corporation is one of the largest poultry producers in the United States and a major player in the global food industry. Established in 1946, the company specializes in the production, processing, and distribution of chicken products. Headquartered in Greeley, Colorado, Pilgrim's Pride operates numerous processing plants and feed mills across the U.S., Mexico, and Puerto Rico, supplying a wide range of chicken products to retail, foodservice, and industrial customers. With a commitment to high-quality standards, the company emphasizes animal welfare, food safety, and sustainability in its operations. Pilgrim's Pride provides both raw and fully cooked chicken products, catering to a diverse array of culinary needs. The company continues to innovate its product offerings, including organic and antibiotic-free poultry options, to meet the evolving preferences of consumers. Pilgrim's Pride is a subsidiary of JBS S.A., one of the world's largest food companies, which enhances its operational capabilities and market reach. In the face of increasing global demand for protein, Pilgrim's Pride is focused on expanding its production capacity, improving efficiency, and enhancing its supply chain to ensure that it remains a leader in the poultry industry. The company's mission is to provide high-quality, nutritious food products while maintaining responsible production practices that benefit both its customers and the communities it serves.
